description:
What's Coming in 2016:

As of 1/23/2016 I've changed the title of this course to include stress-reducing job seeking techniques. Stay tuned for additional lectures at no charge.

About this Course:

Relax, rejoice and rejuvenate. If you want to facilitate YOUR DISCOVERY of different aspects of meditation, yoga and easy-to-implement relaxation and rejuvenation techniques, this course is for you.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

5-Star Review by Charles King:
Some pretty cool stuff I was impressed with the way that affirmations were read with three different types of emphasis--that's new to me, and I like the idea of playing a video while I do other things in different windows.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Each person is unique, so I have made many of the lectures and videos available for a free preview, and I encourage you to view them and decide if this course is right for you.

Unlike most courses, this course does not expect you to watch every video (lecture.) I've gone out of my way to provide a wide variety of resources for different types of people.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

5-Star Review by Samir Ganich

Great! Very inspirational and helpful, life changing stuff. Thank you for your brilliant work, Alan!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Take this course if you want to feel more balanced, or if you want to learn or improve your yoga and meditation skills.

There are many different types of meditation videos, with a wide variety of music--Bollywood, flute, spiritual, classical, rap, guitar, and more.

The 70 yoga instructional videos range from 1 to 2 minutes, and if you put them on autoplay, you can use them to do a yoga practice or meditation.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

5-Star Review by Vanessa Davilla

I've gone through the first 11 lessons and feel great I like the way that this course encourages me to think about what's important to me. I already wrote an affirmation and uploaded it with a favorite photo.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

This course includes three of my books. The books alone cost $60 or more. They allow you to delve deeper, on your schedule.

This course is being expanded, and you'll have lifetime access to it.

I make you this promise. If you don't find what you are seeking in this course, open a discussion item and tell me what you want. As long as it does not violate someone's copyright rights, I'll make every effort to add that material.

Alan

P.S. Join now while the introductory price is in effect.
title: Meditation Plus
